## Nitro Nightly Version Pinning

The dependency `"nitro": "npm:nitro-nightly@3.0.1-20260115-135431-98fc91c5"` in `package.json` is pinned to a specific nightly build (published 2026-01-15, hash 98fc91c5) instead of `@latest`.

This ensures reproducible installs. To deliberately update, visit https://www.npmjs.com/package/nitro-nightly?activeTab=versions and select a newer version/date or commit identifier.
